alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:41PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weld, southeastern Larimer and northeastern Boulder Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 540 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Erie, or 24 miles north of Denver, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Greeley, Longmont, Loveland, Brighton, Lafayette, Windsor, Evans, Erie, Firestone, Johnstown, Frederick, Fort Lupton, Milliken, Berthoud, Dacono, Mead, Platteville, Gilcrest, and Niwot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
